bug.author: fritzo
bug.summary: pyro.deterministic RuntimeWarning when called outside of inference
bug.description:
From <denchmark-link:https://forum.pyro.ai/t/behaviour-of-pyro-deterministic/1570>https://forum.pyro.ai/t/behaviour-of-pyro-deterministic/1570</denchmark-link>
pyro.deterministic should be able to be called outside of inference.

comments.comment: I think this should be resolved with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyro-ppl/pyro/issues/2214>#2214</denchmark-link> . I can take a look at that, if that seems like a reasonable solution.
